ENGLISH: My Precious...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ My Precious...

ENGLISH: It came to me, and it will stay with me forever. But the others... can't trust them... they want to steal my ring!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ It came to me, and it will stay with me forever. But the others... can't trust them... they want to steal my ring!

ENGLISH: I must keep a close eye on them...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ I must keep a close eye on them...

ENGLISH: No, I will not get paranoid!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ No, I will not get paranoid!

ENGLISH: An Outrage
FRENCH: @FIXME@ An Outrage

ENGLISH: This person was staring at me, as if trying to catch a glimpse of the ring. I will not tolerate plots to steal what is mine!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ This person was staring at me, as if trying to catch a glimpse of the ring. I will not tolerate plots to steal what is mine!

ENGLISH: To the dungeon with this cretin!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ To the dungeon with this cretin!

ENGLISH: Execute them immediately!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ Execute them immediately!

ENGLISH: Banish them, on pain of death!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ Banish them, on pain of death!

ENGLISH: My Precious...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ My Precious...

ENGLISH: The ring is so pretty, so powerful. But it makes me so angry that other people may try to take it from me!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ The ring is so pretty, so powerful. But it makes me so angry that other people may try to take it from me!

ENGLISH: It's mine, mine alone!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ It's mine, mine alone!

ENGLISH: I won't give in to these thoughts!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ I won't give in to these thoughts!

ENGLISH: My Precious...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ My Precious...

ENGLISH: Everything I want, I have the power to take. Why should I deny myself anything? I am the Wielder of the Ring!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ Everything I want, I have the power to take. Why should I deny myself anything? I am the Wielder of the Ring!

ENGLISH: I deserve only the finest things.
FRENCH: @FIXME@ I deserve only the finest things.

ENGLISH: My Precious...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ My Precious...

ENGLISH: Good me doesn't want to hurt prisoners, but evil me... evil me wants to see them suffer an excruciating death! They want my ring! They'll suffer, they will all suffer...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ Good me doesn't want to hurt prisoners, but evil me... evil me wants to see them suffer an excruciating death! They want my ring! They'll suffer, they will all suffer...

ENGLISH: It's their own fault for opposing me.
FRENCH: @FIXME@ It's their own fault for opposing me.

ENGLISH: My Precious...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ My Precious...

ENGLISH: I'm not... strong willed... or wise... enough... to wield this ring! Aggghhh! I can feel my mind cracking! It's cracking open, and the ring is reaching into my skull! It's telling me to ... to...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ I'm not... strong willed... or wise... enough... to wield this ring! Aggghhh! I can feel my mind cracking! It's cracking open, and the ring is reaching into my skull! It's telling me to ... to...

ENGLISH: Precious wants me to do terrible things!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ Precious wants me to do terrible things!

ENGLISH: You must expand
FRENCH: @FIXME@ You must expand

ENGLISH: Your enemies will not stand still and wait. You must expand your borders and grow your armies, and finally one day you will be strong enough to challenge Sauron himself!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ Your enemies will not stand still and wait. You must expand your borders and grow your armies, and finally one day you will be strong enough to challenge Sauron himself!

ENGLISH: I could take that kingdom...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ I could take that kingdom...

ENGLISH: My Precious...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ My Precious...

ENGLISH: The ring and I are becoming attuned. I see clearly now for the first time ever - I must rule this Middle-Earth, and nothing will stand in my way!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ The ring and I are becoming attuned. I see clearly now for the first time ever - I must rule this Middle-Earth, and nothing will stand in my way!

ENGLISH: I can't deny it any longer!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ I can't deny it any longer!

ENGLISH: Corrupted by Darkness
FRENCH: @FIXME@ Corrupted by Darkness

ENGLISH: The ruler who wields the ring has been corrupted by it, as would inevitably happen. The wielder is apparently bare recognizable from his or her true self now...
FRENCH: @FIXME@ The ruler who wields the ring has been corrupted by it, as would inevitably happen. The wielder is apparently bare recognizable from his or her true self now...

ENGLISH: I'm not surprised.
FRENCH: @FIXME@ I'm not surprised.
